Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory148.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "From the radar readings and Changyu's description, this should be the port Commandant's signals came from.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We can't get a more precise set of coordinates. Our radars are not only being interfered with, but Commandant's signal is being blocked and double-encrypted.", 4: '3'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Asslam just took heavy damage and their combative capability is limited. Sophia and Changyu both expressed wishes to join in our rescue of Commandant, but it might not be appropriate.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yes, we'll have to find Commandant by ourselves.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Changyu\'s suggestion is that we wait here for... that legendary "ship".', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's do another ground search. We might have missed something. Commandant...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...I just lost the connection to Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Calm your M.I.N.D. The signal didn't die off suddenly, so Commandant must have disconnected it on purpose. No harm should have come to Commandant.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But what would make Commandant disconnect on us like that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "We'll have to trust Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'After all, 【kuroname】 is not someone who gives up without a fight. Commandant must be trying to get back to us.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Bio signals detected on the sea's surface, and they're closing in!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory171.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...This ship.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'And this architectural design...'}
{3: 'Of～flexile～and～～～simulacrous～make～'}
{3: 'Thusly～～～it～cometh～and～goeth～～～at～the～pluck～of～digits～ten～～～'}
{3: 'How～transient～its～flutter～～～'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory148.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The sounds seem to be rhythmic. Is that some kind of song?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Or it might be a form of "opera recital."', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Opera recital?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I looked it up through speech detection, but I found nothing except some pre-pandemic text about "Xiqu", a form of opera. The lines are apparently saying something about puppet shows.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The writing is archaic and rhetorical, and seems be from some lost Eastern civilization. This would be classified as part of the precious human legacy.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Well, hard to get more info than this right now, though.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I feel like Ayla would be overjoyed if she's here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The ship has docked.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I detect the presence of Commandant's Mind Beacon...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Right on this ship.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...A lot of biological signals coming from the ship. No Corrupted signals yet...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's get aboard.", 4: '1'}
